Package nl.nikhef.jgridstart.gui.util

Graphical user-interface utilities

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TemplateWizard.PageListener  
 

Class Summary
ArrayListModel<T> An ArrayList that can be used as a ListModel.
CertificateFileChooser Filechooser for PEM and PKCS#12 files
CertificateSelection Keeps track of currently selected certificate
ErrorMessage Uniform way to handle error messages.
FileFilterSuffix FileFilter that works with suffixes.
TemplateButtonPanel A TemplatePanel in a scrolled window with buttons below.
TemplateWizard HTML-based wizard dialog.
URLLauncher URL Handler to external webbrowser and Action invocation.
URLLauncherCertificate URL Handler uses an external web browser specified by a CertificatePair.
